info.title: Check a radio button in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstRadioButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first radio button

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Regular crust' radio button, check the radio button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Regular crust' radio button, check the radio button.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Change in state, to 'checked', is conveyed
